articles.title: WhatsApp Latest Update: Meta-owned messaging app working feature to silently exit groups - Times Now
articles.description: WhatsApp, is reportedly working on a feature which will allow users to exit groups silently. Once the feature is rolled out, other group members will not be able to see whether one of them has left the group. Only group admin will get notification.
